text:
Hi All,

I have given a try to the below code,
POI version-3.8 and i have referred the class path of the following jar
1.poi-3.8-20120326.jar
2.poi-excelant-3.8-20120326.jar
3.poi-ooxml-3.8-20120326.jar
4.poi-ooxml-schemas-3.8-20120326.jar
5.poi-scratchpad-3.8-20120326.jar

But am not getting what tried wrong,Correct me..
  XWPFDocument doc = new XWPFDocument(new FileInputStream("C:\\Users\\jancy.thangarasu\\Desktop\\source.docx"));

        XWPFDocument destDoc =new XWPFDocument();

        OutputStream out = new FileOutputStream("C:\\Users\\jancy.thangarasu\\Desktop\\Destination.docx");

        XWPFParagraph pr = (XWPFParagraph)doc.getParagraphs();

        String copy=pr.getText();

        XWPFParagraph paragraphOne = destDoc.createParagraph();

        XWPFRun paragraphOneRunOne = paragraphOne.createRun();

        paragraphOneRunOne.setText(copy);

        destDoc.write(out);

But Throwing the following error
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/dom4j/DocumentException
        at org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.OPCPackage.init(OPCPackage.java:154)
        at org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.OPCPackage.<init>(OPCPackage.java:141)
        at org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.Package.<init>(Package.java:54)
        at org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.ZipPackage.<init>(ZipPackage.java:82)
        at org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.OPCPackage.open(OPCPackage.java:228)
        at org.apache.poi.util.PackageHelper.open(PackageHelper.java:39)
        at org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument.<init>(XWPFDocument.java:120)
        at demo.view.XHWPF_test.main(XHWPF_test.java:28)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.dom4j.DocumentException
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
        ... 8 more


Thanks in advance.
creator: jeyasri021291@gmail.com

text:
Firstly, Bugzilla is not the place for user questions, they belong on the user mailing list

Secondly, as the exception makes clear, you're missing a dependency. (Dom4J in your case). The components page <http://poi.apache.org/overview.html#components> lists all of the dependencies of POI, which all ship in the binary package, or are all defined in the POMs for maven users.
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
